abstract: Liesl Schillinger reviews books The Long Weekend: Life in the English Country House, 1918-1939 by Adrian Tinniswood, The Mistresses of Cliveden: Three Centuries of Scandal, Power, and Intrigue in an English Stately Home by Natalie Livingstone and Fall of Poppies: Stories of Love and the Great War by various authors.

headline.main: ‘The Long Weekend,’ ‘The Mistresses of Cliveden’ and ‘Fall of Poppies’

keywords.value: The Long Weekend: Life in the English Country House, 1918-1939 (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Plenty of summer reading for those still craving a “Downton Abbey” fix.
lead_paragraph: Plenty of summer reading for those still craving a “Downton Abbey” fix.
